channel.title: Tram ride freeze
channel.description:
Whenever I try to start the game I only get to the first load screen after the tram ride voice mentions what temperature the facility is set to.
I see this: ![](upload://4z5G2IZt5wOwviENunvdlKHFy6w.png)
followed by this: ![](upload://kSiAlyoD6cc1hXIpTpWWMYxBRSA.png)
which is a frozen image. The music continues to play, but this is as far as I could go.

item.title: Tram ride freeze
item.dc:creator: xaronax
item.description:
Having same problem after 5 reinstalls, all MD5 hashes verified.

Read full topic

item.title: Tram ride freeze
item.dc:creator: roadcoder
item.description:
Well I fixed it by scrubbing the install and re-installing it.

Thanks for having my bag on this.

Read full topic
